home.transform_desc: ShapeSpeak is an educational model product for children aged 2‚Äì4, including visually impaired kids, using AI-integrated camera recognition and geometric assembly.
home.mission_desc: To revolutionize early childhood education by creating interactive learning tools that make math concepts accessible, engaging, and fun for all children, regardless of ability.
home.features_desc: ShapeSpeak brings math to life through multi-sensory experiences
home.feature_1_desc: Each geometric block has a distinct shape and color, recognized by an AI-powered camera when placed on the base, helping children learn through visual and auditory feedback.
home.feature_2_desc: Children combine shapes to create complete objects, triggering educational stories about simple arithmetic and geometric properties.
home.feature_3_desc: Special textures and audio feedback make ShapeSpeak equally effective for visually impaired children, promoting inclusive education.
home.feature_4_desc: Our upcoming app will expand learning opportunities with educational games and interactive content for children and parents.
home.feature_5_desc: Enhances logical thinking, shape recognition, and problem-solving skills through playful, hands-on activities.
home.feature_6_desc: Bright, attractive colors stimulate visual learning and make the experience more engaging for young children.
home.tech_intro: ShapeSpeak uses an overhead camera and AI image recognition to help children identify and combine shapes through visual cues and responsive feedback.
home.tech_point1: When a shape is placed on the base, the camera captures and sends the image to an AI system to identify it and play its corresponding sound.
home.tech_point2: Children can creatively assemble shapes into full objects. The AI recognizes these creations and plays encouraging sounds and educational stories.
home.tech_point3: The camera setup is optimized at 24cm height above the base, ensuring accurate scanning from top-down perspective.
home.tech_point4: Special textured pieces and voice feedback make this experience inclusive for visually impaired children.
home.impact_desc: ShapeSpeak addresses critical developmental needs during the crucial early childhood years
home.impact_box1_desc: Targets the critical developmental window when children's brains are most receptive to foundational math concepts
home.impact_box2_desc: Equally effective for sighted and visually impaired children, promoting equal learning opportunities
home.impact_box3_desc: Multi-sensory approach increases engagement and retention compared to traditional methods
home.vision_desc: To become the global standard in early childhood math education, transforming how children ages 2‚Äì4 develop foundational mathematical thinking through innovative, inclusive technology.
home.roadmap_item1: Expand to additional STEM concepts beyond geometry
home.roadmap_item2: Develop multilingual support for global accessibility
home.roadmap_item3: Create adaptive learning algorithms that personalize content
home.roadmap_item4: Partner with educational institutions for curriculum integration
home.core1_desc: We constantly push boundaries to create groundbreaking educational tools
home.core2_desc: We design for all children, ensuring no one is left behind in learning
home.core3_desc: We believe education should be fun, engaging, and inspiring
home.core4_desc: We foster curiosity and resilience in young learners
home.expert_quote: ShapeSpeak represents a paradigm shift in early math education. By combining tactile, auditory, and visual learning modalities, it addresses multiple learning styles simultaneously ‚Äì a game-changer for inclusive education.
